title: Eat nuts 4 times
information: Nuts are rich in healthy fats and magnesium — aim to eat a handful 4 times this week.

title: Have oats for breakfast 3 times
information: Oats provide long-lasting energy and stabilize blood sugar — aim for 3 bowls this week.

title: Enjoy yogurt with honey 3 times
information: Support gut health with probiotics from yogurt — try to include it 3 times this week.

title: Drink soy milk drinks 3 times
information: Soy milk is a great dairy alternative — enjoy it 3 times this week.

title: Eat seafood twice
information: Seafood like salmon is high in omega-3s — aim for at least two servings this week.

title: Eat eggs 3 times
information: Eggs are a great source of protein and essential nutrients. Try eating them 3 times this week.

title: Eat vegetables
information: Eat vegetables at least 7 times this week. Boosts fiber and supports digestion. Keep it up all week!

title: Drink 8 glasses of water
information: Keep yourself hydrated with at least 8 glasses of water this week.

title: No sugary snacks
information: Avoid sugary snacks for the entire week to support better energy levels.
